title: Password Generator
summary: My first javascript project. This app will build a unique password for the user.

title: weatherDash
summary: This app generates weather forecast data for the user based on searched cities. The list of cities previously searched remain persistent.

title: Taskday
summary: This project helps organize tasks by hour for a given day and uses Moment.js to customize the CSS.

title: Brewery Hopper
summary: This was my first team project. Search for breweries by city and display the location on a map.

title: Sundial
summary: This was my second team project. This app helps track the time spent on project throughout the day and summarizes total time spent on each project in decimal hours to report into a time sheet.

title: NoteTaker
summary: This application is used to write, save, and delete notes. This application uses an express backend to save and retrieve note data from a JSON file.
